Modal-Title: Restaurant Landing Page from UI/UX design
Modal-Body: A project where I took a UI/UX design and implemented it using React
Used an API to create a search engine where the user can search for standard search results, images, videos, and news articles
Technologies: HTML, CSS, Javascript, React, Custom API

Modal-Title: This site you're seeing right now!
Modal-Body: This website is a culmination of all the things I've learned so far and I'd like to say I'm pretty proud of it.

This website was my first dip into multi page react apps and API's. This website takes a city inputted by the user and the site displays the weather information for current, 48 hours(hour by hour), and 7 day forecasts.
Technologies: HTML, Plain CSS, Javascript, React, Open Weather API, Auto Correct API
